projectReviews.ProjectTitle: DSMC simulation of Rayleigh Benard flows in a Rarefied regime
review: Basically meant to simulate a continuum phenomena in a Rarefied regime (found in microscale flows and very high altitudes/near space). We use OpenFOAM (specifically dsmcfoam) to simulate this

projectReviews.ProjectTitle: Two way Fluid Structure Interaction (FSI) in flexible structures with low mass ratios
review: Usually intended to simulate FSI between submerged structures in oceans like mooring lines and oil boring pipes. Involves writing a specialised C code (also called an user defined function) which can only be compiled in ansys fluent.

projectReviews.ProjectTitle: 2D Materials Based Photodetectors
review: Really nice prof , has alot of knowledge in this domain. Though it would've been better if I could do this offline. Replies promptly and answers all my questions. The work is very interesting too . No complaints, would definitely recommend if you're interested in his work.

projectReviews.ProjectTitle: Redesigning Automotive Interiors with an emphasis on Sustainability
review: This project is particularly relevant for the Indian automotive scenario, with a special focus on sub-4m vehicles. There is a massive research gap with respect to sustainability approaches to design in the Indian automotive industry, this study hopes to shorten that gap.

projectReviews.ProjectTitle: Flow induced rotation on a Square cylinder mounted on a torsion spring
review: A great learning experience, very nice professor to work with, requires some amount of prior knowledge in MATLAB and gmsh. Some knowledge in Python useful too for post processing. Have to put decent amount of effort from your side to actually get a feel of the problem.

projectReviews.ProjectTitle: Study of arithmetic of elliptic curves and elliptic curve cryptography
review: Algebra intensive, do not take unless willing to spend first 1-2 months on algebra alone

projectReviews.ProjectTitle: Elliptic Curves and Elliptic Curve Cryptography
review: Wonderful experience with lot of freedom and no pressure whatsoever ^_^

projectReviews.ProjectTitle: Remote Sensing and socio economic indicators
review: There are a lot of things to learn but the time constraints are humongous. The will to learn is there but the process is slow and time consuming.

projectReviews.ProjectTitle: Impact of COVID 19 on Economy
review:
Pretty chill work 
Ma'am doesn't expect much efforts
One or two hrs of work per week needed

projectReviews.ProjectTitle: DTF Computation
review: Sir is pretty good, but amount of computational required is high.... So you need to ask for access from Mechanical Department

projectReviews.ProjectTitle: Design and simulation of textured insulator
review: Continuation of last sems work. Last sem I designed a normal insulator. End goal is to compare both the types .

projectReviews.ProjectTitle: Ballistic testing of metal foam composites
review: Great learning experience

projectReviews.ProjectTitle: Wearable sensors
review: It is difficult to perform experimental work from home hence have to do the theoretical aspects as of now. The project is 80% practical though.

projectReviews.ProjectTitle: Deep Learning for Time Series Classification
review: Good so far. Expects work every week but helpful

projectReviews.ProjectTitle: Large area pressure sensor for smart floor sensor applications
review: Not currently doing this. But finished it up almost a year ago

projectReviews.ProjectTitle: Pharmacoligical interventions for Uveitis
review: It was really great working under sir, despite covid situation and online classes, doing a project type course under him was very helpful in getting concepts clear.

projectReviews.ProjectTitle: Computer Vision based Quality Assurance of Mechanical Assembly Components
review: Great work, amazing learning experience

projectReviews.ProjectTitle: Mechanism of EMT and therapeutic strategy in cancer
projectReviews.review: It would be great if I could get physical lab experience, since pharmacy and biology cannot be done online. We need to conduct experiments. Only writing a report by conducting literature review doesn't serve the purpose of such a project.

projectReviews.ProjectTitle: Medication and Management strategies for Alzheimer's Disease
review: It would be better if I could pursue the DOP in an offline format. Would be helpful to do the lab work and gain hands-on experience.

projectReviews.ProjectTitle: Analysis of the high strain rate deformation behavior of metallic foams
review: My part Involves Image pre processing and Triangulation meshing for construction of a FE model for Quasti static and Dynamic Testing Analysis on ABAQUS and LS Dyna

projectReviews.ProjectTitle: Trends in portfolios of Indian Households
review:
Ma'am is very helpful
Very Lite 
One hour work per week and you are good to go

projectReviews.ProjectTitle: Wearable sensors
review: It is difficult to perform experimental work from home hence have to do the theoretical aspects as of now. The project is 80% practical though.

projectReviews.ProjectTitle: Development of lipsomal formulation for anticancer drugs
review: Firdt half of the project was to study about lipsomes and its action and the second half was to design a formulation method for a specific drug

projectReviews.ProjectTitle: Heavy metal removal
review: Decent grading, workload of 10-12 hrs per week

projectReviews.ProjectTitle: Nanomaterial Adsorbents in Heavy Metal Removal
review: You have to put in work, but he is serious about getting publication which will be valuable to your cv as well.

projectReviews.ProjectTitle: CFD of wind flows over low rise buildings
projectReviews.review: It's a pretty long term project, and involves doing 2D and 3D (mostly) CFD simulations using Ansys fluent. It's used to predict aerodynamic loads on the upcoming LIGO India project.

profReviews.ProjectTitle: Kalman Filter applications in Microgrids for state estimation and stability issues
review: Going well so far. Really responsive and helpful prof.

profReviews.ProjectTitle: Optimal Capital Structure of listed firms
review: Student friendly prof. Too good and very helpful if the student is really interested and could show it to her.
She is helpful and will give you any assistance you require. However, she also expects a lot of dedication and effort from your end.

profReviews.ProjectTitle: Machine Learning methods for Water parameter analysis and prediction
review: A very amazing professor, expects sincerity from you and will not pressurise you with deadlines or so, all she wants is an honest and sincere try from the studentâ€™s side to try and complete the problem statement

Yeah it's quite interesting, it started of with a presentation on topics svm , lstm and Relevance vector machine and currently I have started the coding part of the project.As iam currently doing this project in the current semister I don't have more information unless this semester ends. If you want any other information regarding whatsoever mail me.

Really nice prof , has alot of knowledge in this domain. Though it would've been better if I could do this offline. Replies promptly and answers all my questions. The work is very interesting too . No complaints, would definitely recommend if you're interested in his work.

profReviews.ProjectTitle: Efficient PRNG Method for Hardware Security
review: Pretty nice, lite Prof, doesn't demand submissions but you should show your interest. Laid back work and you can go at your own pace.
Extremely interesting subject area, with a lot of scope for further research.
Great prof to do project under.
The instructor is very good, he guides you well, always ready to help. It will be a easy project under him.
